latestMobiles.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
latestMobiles.description: The iPhone 14 Pro features Apple's Dynamic Island, a ProMotion 120Hz display, and the powerful A16 Bionic chip.

latestMobiles.name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
latestMobiles.description: The Galaxy S22 Ultra offers a premium design with an S-Pen and a 108MP quad-camera setup.

latestMobiles.name: Google Pixel 7 Pro
latestMobiles.description: Pixel 7 Pro is powered by Google's Tensor G2 chip, offering exceptional AI capabilities.

latestMobiles.name: OnePlus 10 Pro
latestMobiles.description: OnePlus 10 Pro delivers a smooth OxygenOS experience with a Hasselblad-tuned triple-camera system.

latestMobiles.name: Xiaomi Mi 12 Pro
latestMobiles.description: Xiaomi Mi 12 Pro offers an all-50MP camera setup and a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor.

latestLaptops.name: Apple MacBook Air M3
latestLaptops.description: The new MacBook Air M3 offers exceptional performance and a high-resolution Retina display.

latestLaptops.name: Dell Inspiron 14 Plus
latestLaptops.description: Dell Inspiron 14 Plus offers a sleek design with a powerful Intel 13th Gen processor.

latestLaptops.name: Asus Zenbook 14 OLED (Q425)
latestLaptops.description: Asus Zenbook 14 OLED delivers vibrant visuals and a lightweight design.

latestCameras.name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
latestCameras.description: Canon EOS R6 Mark II is a high-speed full-frame mirrorless camera.

latestCameras.name: Sony A7 IV
latestCameras.description: Sony A7 IV offers an upgraded 33MP sensor with enhanced autofocus.

latestHeadphones.name: Apple AirPods Max
latestHeadphones.description: Apple AirPods Max offers spatial audio and industry-leading noise cancellation.

latestHeadphones.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
latestHeadphones.description: Sony WH-1000XM5 provides industry-leading noise cancellation and superior sound quality.

refrigerators.name: LG 260L Frost Free Refrigerator
refrigerators.description: LG's 260L frost-free refrigerator offers energy efficiency, spacious compartments, and an inverter compressor for quiet operation.

refrigerators.name: Samsung 345L Convertible Refrigerator
refrigerators.description: Samsung's 345L convertible refrigerator provides flexible storage options with Twin Cooling Plus technology to keep food fresh longer.

refrigerators.name: Whirlpool 190L Single Door Refrigerator
refrigerators.description: Whirlpool's 190L refrigerator comes with insulated capillary technology for better cooling and a large freezer for efficient storage.

microwaves.name: LG 28L Convection Microwave
microwaves.description: LG's 28L convection microwave features auto-cook menus, grill functionality, and even heating for perfect meals.

microwaves.name: Panasonic 20L Solo Microwave
microwaves.description: Panasonic's 20L solo microwave offers quick and even heating, ideal for small families and bachelors.

microwaves.name: Samsung 32L Grill Microwave
microwaves.description: Samsung's 32L grill microwave features a ceramic interior, anti-bacterial coating, and strong grilling options.

washingMachines.name: IFB 8kg Front Load Washing Machine
washingMachines.description: IFB's 8kg front-load washing machine features an inverter motor, high-speed spin, and multiple wash programs for efficiency.

washingMachines.name: Samsung 7kg Top Load Washing Machine
washingMachines.description: Samsung's 7kg top-load washing machine provides powerful cleaning with wobble technology and digital inverter motor.

washingMachines.name: LG 6.5kg Semi-Automatic Washing Machine
washingMachines.description: LG's 6.5kg semi-automatic washing machine features roller jet pulsator technology for effective washing.

vacuumCleaners.name: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
vacuumCleaners.description: Dyson's V11 cordless vacuum cleaner offers powerful suction, intelligent sensors, and long battery life for deep cleaning.

vacuumCleaners.name: Philips PowerPro Compact Vacuum
vacuumCleaners.description: Philips PowerPro Compact vacuum cleaner provides strong suction, easy maneuverability, and hygienic dust disposal.

vacuumCleaners.name: Eureka Forbes Trendy Wet & Dry Vacuum
vacuumCleaners.description: Eureka Forbes wet & dry vacuum cleaner is ideal for home and car cleaning with powerful suction and a large dustbin.

kidsTopWear.name: Graphic T-Shirt
kidsTopWear.description: A fun and comfortable graphic tee featuring the iconic Nike logo, perfect for active kids. Made with soft cotton to keep your little one comfortable all day long.

kidsTopWear.name: Striped Polo Shirt
kidsTopWear.description: A stylish striped polo shirt that combines comfort and sophistication. Ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions, it’s a must-have for your child’s wardrobe.

kidsTopWear.name: Printed Hoodie
kidsTopWear.description: This cozy hoodie with a bold Adidas print is perfect for cooler days. It's soft, warm, and features a front pocket for storing small treasures.

kidsBottomWear.name: Denim Jeans
kidsBottomWear.description: Classic blue denim jeans that are durable and comfortable. Perfect for everyday wear, these jeans feature a timeless style that pairs well with any top.

kidsBottomWear.name: Cargo Shorts
kidsBottomWear.description: These cargo shorts are both functional and stylish, with multiple pockets for storing little treasures. Made from soft cotton for all-day comfort.

kidsBottomWear.name: Sweatpants
kidsBottomWear.description: Cozy sweatpants with an elastic waistband for a snug fit. Ideal for lounging or sports activities, these sweatpants are both comfortable and trendy.

kidsBottomWear.name: Chino Pants
kidsBottomWear.description: These chino pants are perfect for semi-formal or casual wear. They offer a neat and stylish look, with a soft cotton fabric for all-day comfort.

kidsShoes.name: Nike Kids Air Max 270
kidsShoes.description: Stylish and comfortable sneakers for kids with Air Max cushioning for extra comfort. Features a breathable mesh upper, ideal for everyday wear.

kidsShoes.name: Adidas Kids UltraBOOST 22
kidsShoes.description: Lightweight running shoes for kids with responsive Boost cushioning. Designed to provide support and comfort for active kids during sports and play.

kidsShoes.name: Skechers Kids Sport Shoes
kidsShoes.description: Durable sport shoes for kids featuring a flexible sole and cushioned insole for comfort during outdoor activities and school use.

kidsShoes.name: Puma Kids Smash v2 Sneakers
kidsShoes.description: Classic low-top sneakers with a sleek design and cushioned footbed for comfort. Perfect for casual wear, school, or outings.

kidsToys.name: LEGO Classic Set
kidsToys.description: A creative LEGO set that allows kids to build anything they imagine. Includes various colors and shapes to spark creativity and improve fine motor skills.

kidsToys.name: Barbie Doll Set
kidsToys.description: A Barbie doll set that includes a fashionable doll and accessories. Perfect for imaginative play, letting kids create stories and adventures with Barbie.

kidsToys.name: Hot Wheels Cars
kidsToys.description: A pack of mini race cars that kids can collect and race. Fun and fast-paced play that promotes creativity and fine motor skills.

kidsToys.name: Fisher-Price Activity Center
kidsToys.description: An interactive toy that helps babies develop motor skills through fun activities. Includes bright colors, sounds, and textures that stimulate learning.

kidsToys.name: Play-Doh Fun Factory
kidsToys.description: A fun Play-Doh set that lets kids shape, mold, and create their own colorful designs. Ideal for creative play and improving hand-eye coordination.

kidsToys.name: VTech Robot Toy
kidsToys.description: An educational robot toy that teaches kids shapes, colors, and numbers. With interactive buttons and sound effects, it makes learning fun.

kidsToys.name: Nerf Blaster
kidsToys.description: A foam dart blaster for safe, action-packed fun. Perfect for outdoor play and helps kids develop hand-eye coordination and aim.

kidsToys.name: Cabbage Patch Kids Doll
kidsToys.description: A cuddly and collectible doll with unique features. Each doll comes with its own name and story, encouraging imaginative play and nurturing skills.

mensShirts.name: Classic Oxford Shirt

mensShirts.description: A sophisticated dress shirt designed for formal occasions. The premium fabric blend provides a sleek look and a comfortable fit.

mensShirts.description: Lightweight and breathable, this linen shirt is perfect for warm weather. It offers a relaxed yet stylish look for casual outings.

mensPants.description: A timeless pair of jeans with a classic straight-leg design. Durable and comfortable, ideal for everyday wear.

mensPants.name: Athletic Fit Joggers
mensPants.description: Designed for active lifestyles, these joggers provide a perfect blend of comfort and flexibility, making them great for workouts or casual outings.

mensPants.name: Formal Dress Pants
mensPants.description: Elevate your formal look with these high-quality slim-fit dress pants. Crafted from a premium wool blend for a refined appearance.

mensPants.name: Cargo Pants
mensPants.description: A rugged and stylish pair of cargo pants featuring multiple pockets for utility. Great for outdoor activities and casual wear.

mensPants.description: Lightweight and breathable linen pants with a comfortable drawstring waist. Ideal for summer vacations and beachwear.

mensPants.description: Stay comfortable and stylish with these tapered track pants. Perfect for workouts, lounging, or streetwear fashion.

mensShoes.name: Nike Air Max 270
mensShoes.description: A comfortable and stylish pair of sneakers with a breathable mesh upper and Air Max cushioning. Perfect for everyday wear or a casual sporty look.

mensShoes.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
mensShoes.description: Lightweight and responsive running shoes designed for maximum comfort. Featuring Boost cushioning and a breathable knit upper for a smooth run.

mensShoes.name: Timberland PRO 6" Work Boots
mensShoes.description: Durable and tough work boots with steel toes for protection and waterproof leather. These boots are designed to handle demanding work environments.

mensShoes.name: Puma Suede Classic
mensShoes.description: Classic suede sneakers with a retro look. Known for their style and comfort, they are perfect for casual outfits and everyday activities.

mensAccessories.name: Rolex Submariner
mensAccessories.description: The Rolex Submariner is an iconic luxury dive watch featuring a robust design, water resistance up to 300m, and a timeless aesthetic perfect for any occasion.

mensAccessories.name: Montblanc Sartorial Wallet
mensAccessories.description: The Montblanc Sartorial Wallet is a sleek and sophisticated accessory crafted from full-grain leather, offering premium style and functionality for modern gentlemen.

mensAccessories.name: Ray-Ban Aviator
mensAccessories.description: Ray-Ban Aviator sunglasses offer timeless style, superior eye protection, and lightweight durability, making them a must-have accessory for men.

mensAccessories.name: Gucci Signature Leather Belt

mensAccessories.name: David Yurman Cable Bracelet
mensAccessories.description: The David Yurman Cable Bracelet blends modern craftsmanship with classic design, featuring twisted sterling silver with gold accents for a bold statement.

womensTops.description: This lightweight floral blouse adds a pop of color to your wardrobe. Perfect for casual days or dressed up with accessories.

womensTops.name: V-Neck Knit Top

womensTops.name: Sleeveless Peplum Top
womensTops.description: This sleeveless peplum top adds a touch of elegance to your look with its flattering silhouette. Great for both casual and formal settings.

womensTops.description: A classic button-down shirt with bold stripes for a chic and timeless look. Perfect for work or casual outings.

womensTops.name: Graphic Tee
womensTops.description: A soft and casual graphic tee with a trendy design. Great for everyday wear and paired with jeans or skirts.

womensTops.description: This cozy cropped sweater is perfect for chilly days. Pair it with high-waisted jeans or skirts for a cute, casual outfit.

womensTops.name: Ruffle Sleeve Top
womensTops.description: A soft and stylish top with ruffle sleeves that adds a feminine touch to your outfit. Great for office wear or weekend outings.

womenTrousers.name: High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
womenTrousers.description: These high-waisted skinny jeans are a wardrobe staple. They offer a flattering silhouette and can be styled with both casual and formal tops.

womenTrousers.description: Perfect for a relaxed yet chic look, these wide-legged trousers are comfortable and stylish. Ideal for work or casual outings.

womenTrousers.name: Tailored Blazer Pants
womenTrousers.description: These tailored blazer pants offer a sophisticated, professional look with their slim fit. Perfect for office wear or formal events.

womenTrousers.name: Culottes
womenTrousers.description: These breezy culottes offer a relaxed fit and are perfect for warm-weather days. Pair them with a crop top or blouse for an easygoing outfit.

womenTrousers.name: Cargo Pants
womenTrousers.description: Stylish and practical, these cargo pants offer multiple pockets for utility. The loose fit gives you comfort while maintaining a trendy look.

womenTrousers.description: Palazzo pants with a high-waisted fit and flowing fabric. Perfect for a relaxed, bohemian style during weekends or vacations.

womenTrousers.description: A classic faux leather skirt with an A-line fit that adds a touch of edge to your outfit. Can be paired with blouses or sweaters for a stylish evening look.

womenTrousers.name: Denim Shorts
womenTrousers.description: These denim shorts are perfect for casual summer days. With their comfortable fit and timeless style, they're ideal for lounging or running errands.

womensShoes.description: Classic low-top sneakers with leather upper, known for their timeless style and comfort. Ideal for casual wear and everyday activities.

womensShoes.description: A signature silhouette featuring a clean and minimalist design. These sneakers are versatile for various outfits and provide all-day comfort.

womensShoes.name: Steve Madden Troopa Boots
womensShoes.description: Stylish and sturdy ankle boots with a faux leather finish, featuring lace-up detailing and a block heel. Perfect for transitioning between seasons.

womensShoes.name: Vans Old Skool
womensShoes.description: Iconic skate shoes with a durable canvas upper, featuring the classic Vans side stripe and a cushioned footbed for comfort and support.

womensHandbags.name: Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM
womensHandbags.description: The Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM is a stylish and spacious tote bag with signature LV monogram design, perfect for daily use or travel.

womensHandbags.name: Gucci Marmont Matelassé
womensHandbags.description: The Gucci Marmont Matelassé features a quilted design with the iconic GG logo, offering a sophisticated and elegant look for any outfit.

womensHandbags.name: Prada Re-Edition 2005
womensHandbags.description: The Prada Re-Edition 2005 is a chic mini shoulder bag made from sustainable recycled nylon, blending fashion and eco-consciousness.

womensHandbags.name: Chanel Classic Flap Bag
womensHandbags.description: The Chanel Classic Flap Bag is a timeless luxury piece featuring quilted lambskin leather, gold hardware, and the iconic CC turn-lock closure.

womensHandbags.name: Dior Lady Dior
womensHandbags.description: The Lady Dior handbag exudes elegance with its quilted Cannage stitching and signature Dior charms, making it a must-have for fashion lovers.

womensJewelry.name: Tiffany Solitaire Diamond Ring
womensJewelry.description: A classic Tiffany solitaire diamond ring featuring a stunning round-cut diamond set in a platinum band, symbolizing timeless elegance.

womensJewelry.name: Cartier Love Necklace
womensJewelry.description: The Cartier Love Necklace is a symbol of eternal love, crafted from 18K yellow gold with a sleek and elegant design.

womensJewelry.description: Mikimoto's Akoya Pearl Earrings feature high-quality pearls set in 18K gold, offering a timeless and sophisticated look.

womensJewelry.description: Pandora’s charm bracelet is a customizable and elegant accessory, made from sterling silver with a variety of charm options.

womensJewelry.name: Swarovski Crystal Anklet
womensJewelry.description: Swarovski’s Crystal Anklet is a delicate and sparkling piece, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit.
